headline: Frontend Software Engineer | React | Next.js | Vue | Nuxt.js | Cypress | Playwright | Jest/Vitest | Write code | Test code | Refactor with confidence | Ship with confidence
summary:
I've been working as a Frontend Software Engineer for over {{year_of_experience}} years. I love making websites that look great and work well, using the newest web tools. Whether I'm working alone or with a team, I enjoy solving problems and doing top-notch work. I like helping out the community too, and you can see some of my projects on GitHub where I share templates and packages for the community.

On my portfolio website and in my open-source projects, I show off my skills in frameworks like React, Next.js, Vue, Nuxt, and Fresh (a Deno fullstack web framework). I'm always eager to learn new things and take on challenges. I work well with others and I'm always looking to improve.

experiences.title: Fullstack Software Developer
experiences.description: Worked as a full-stack developer focused on developing IoT solutions for delivery and room service robots. Developed a progressive web app (PWA) where a user interacts with the robots and nodejs backend API which handles interaction between the app and the robots.

experiences.title: Fullstack Software Developer
experiences.description: Migration and Improvements of Geriatrie Project: The project aims to migrate “Geriatrie Pepper” web app into Geriatrie android application with some improvements in design. And decoupling “Geriatrie Admin” from a pepper robot platform and rewriting of “Geriatrie Admin” web app into Geriatrie Content Management System (CMS) by making responsive design and improving designs.

experiences.title: Fullstack Software Developer
experiences.description: Migration, Improvements and Extensions of KinderPoli (PiPo) Project: The project aims to migrate “PiPo Pepper” web app into KinderPoli android application with some improvements in the design and addition of new functionalities. And decoupling “PiPo Admin” from pepper robot platform and rewriting of “PiPo Admin” web app into KinderPoli Content Management System (CMS) by making responsive design with some new functionalities.

experiences.title: Fullstack Software Developer
experiences.description: Migration, Improvements and Extensions of Geriatrie Project: The project aims to migrate “Geriatrie” app, which was developed during the Graduation Project, improving development workflow & designs and adding some new functionalities.

experiences.title: Fullstack Software Developer
experiences.description: Project PiPo: The project aims to develop two web apps. First, “PiPo Pepper” an app which is used by a health care professional during a training session about pee and poo problems to a kid.  Second, “PiPo Admin” an app which is used by the health care professional to manage the contents that are used during the training session.

experiences.title: Fullstack Software Developer
experiences.description:
Health care, Maxima Medisch Centrum (MMC) wants to put the social humanoid robot "Pepper" into their working environment to solve the problems of elderly people being frustrated during the stay in health care and their care professionals were not able to be with the patients more time to make them engaged.  
Therefore, an assignment was to develop a web-based application for pepper robot which helps them to keep their patients (especially old people) entertained and engaged during the stay in health care by introducing pepper robot onto their working environment. The pepper will be a colleague of the health care professional and work with them together.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Developing a prototype algorithm for OMNEO platform which can differentiate network quality based on the amount of jitter accumulated in the network system.

education.degree_name: Bachelor's degree of Information and communication technology

accomplishment_projects.title: Khajahuis website
accomplishment_projects.description:
Website development for start up Nepalese restaurant in Eindhoven, the Netherlands.

Build using nuxt3 and tailwindcss.

accomplishment_projects.title: Tapovumi Website
accomplishment_projects.description:
Website development of saving and credit organization of Nepal.

Build using nuxt2 and vuetify2.

accomplishment_projects.title: Stadspartij Website
accomplishment_projects.description:
Website development for Sittard-Geleen city political party, the Netherlands.

Build using nextjs and material ui.

accomplishment_projects.title: Locate User- Android App
accomplishment_projects.description: An android app which can show the location of the registered user. The app features include user registration, logging, notification system (gives notification when any of the registered users is within the range of 10 meter), upload profile photo and change password as well as reset password. In this project, GUI was design based on material design, to keep and to retrieve user information such as their location was achieved by using the google real time database server known as “Firebase”.

accomplishment_projects.title: PROCP (Core Phase Project)- Rail Road Simulation Program
accomplishment_projects.description: The project aims building up a desktop application “Rail Road Simulation” which can be used by Rail Road Company to simulate system before they construct Railway tracks. The deliverables of this project include Project Plan, User Requirement Specification, Test Plan, Test Report, Design Document which includes Class Diagram, Sequence Diagram and User Interface Design.

accomplishment_projects.title: FHICT Companion Android App
accomplishment_projects.description: The goal of the project was to develop an android mobile application which will show the class schedule and grades of a student.

accomplishment_projects.title: Pipelines flow in a Network
accomplishment_projects.description: The project objective was to develop a simulation app for a flow of network which could be used by the oil transport company to simulate flow of oil through the pipelines. we did make design document which includes Class Diagram, Sequence Diagram and Graphical User Interface for the simulation app

accomplishment_projects.title: User Interface Design for an App
accomplishment_projects.description: The project aim was to design new User Interface Design for any new application or existing application, new website or existing website. We did make a design for a new application “Drive Me”

accomplishment_projects.title: PROP (Propaedeutic Phase Project)-Application used in social Event
accomplishment_projects.description: The main goal of the project was to organize digitalized social event and develop desktop applications that can be used in the event as well as building up the website for the digital advertisement and buying of tickets through the website. Applications were Entrance, Food and Drinks, Camping, Renting, Top up, Management. Applications were developed by using C# programming language and website was built by using Content Management System (CMS), Joomla

accomplishment_projects.title: Personal Website
accomplishment_projects.description: The project goal was build up a personal website from the scratch where the user can sign up and login into the website by using purely html, CSS, JavaScript and PHP.
